description:
Raccoon has made up his mind again. He is seeing what will happen if he never washes his face. After two weeks, he gets angry and starts pulling up grass. Soon one month has passed. What has happened to Raccoon`s face? Bonobono and Chipmunk timidly approach Raccoon`s house.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Raccoon Makes Up His Mind Again
アライグマくんはまた決心した
